name: GetTeamComponentSets
description:
Retrieve published component sets from a Figma team library.

Use this tool to obtain a paginated list of component sets that are published within a Figma team's library. Call this tool when you need details about the component sets available to a specific team.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team whose component sets are to be listed.

value_schema.description: Id of the team to list component sets from.

parameters.name: number_of_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of component sets to return per page. Default is 30.

value_schema.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30.

parameters.name: start_after_id
parameters.description: Cursor to start retrieving component sets after this ID. Used for pagination. Exclusive with start_before_id.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving component sets for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: start_before_id
parameters.description: Cursor indicating the ID before which to start retrieving component sets. Cannot be used with 'after'.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving component sets for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30.

value_schema.description: Number of items to return in a paged list of results. Defaults to 30.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving component sets for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id after which to start retrieving component sets for. Exclusive with before. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving component sets for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

value_schema.description: Cursor indicating which id before which to start retrieving component sets for. Exclusive with after. The cursor value is an internally tracked integer that doesn't correspond to any Ids.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: Id of the team to list component sets from.

value_schema.description: Id of the team to list component sets from.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
